pr_title: MULE-18200: 4.3.0: expression errors hang MUnit test execution

timeline.message:
MULE-18200: 4.3.0: readUrl getting blocked when file resource is not
present

timeline.bodyText: is it correct to throw the exception even if the if resolved to true and the errorSink received the next() call?
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

replies.bodyText: yes, it will depend on what pipeline is using this component to determine if the exception is needed (Monos) or the result in the callback (Fluxes). In either case, it is a map, so it needs to return a mapped event, or in this case propagate the exception.
replies.author: elrodro83
